data.actual_result: The player quits fullscreen and jumps to present
data.expected_result: The player should quit fullscreen without jumping to present
data.short_description: When escaping (with the key "esc") the full screen of an embedded webm player, the channel "jumps to present messages"
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a link linking to a webm video in a text channel - Send enough messages to have the option "JUMP TO PRESENT" in the lowest part of the screen when looking at the message containing the link - Play the video in full screen - Escape the video with the "escape" key
